ScalarVariable.name: environment.Altitude
ScalarVariable.description: Altitude (Default: Munich)

ScalarVariable.name: environment.alpha
ScalarVariable.description: Longitude (Default: Munich)

ScalarVariable.name: environment.beta
ScalarVariable.description: Latidude (Default: Munich)

ScalarVariable.name: environment.UnixTimeInit
ScalarVariable.description: Initial unix time

ScalarVariable.name: environment.cGround
ScalarVariable.description: Specific heat capacity of the ground

ScalarVariable.name: environment.lambdaGround
ScalarVariable.description: Heat conductivity of the ground

ScalarVariable.name: environment.rhoGround
ScalarVariable.description: Density of ground

ScalarVariable.name: environment.GeoGradient
ScalarVariable.description: Geothermal gradient

ScalarVariable.name: environment.alphaAirGround
ScalarVariable.description: Heat transmission coefficient between ground and air

ScalarVariable.name: environment.cpAir
ScalarVariable.description: Specific heat capacity of air

ScalarVariable.name: environment.rhoAir
ScalarVariable.description: Density of air

ScalarVariable.name: building.nFloors
ScalarVariable.description: Number of full floors

ScalarVariable.name: building.nAp
ScalarVariable.description: Number of apartments

ScalarVariable.name: building.nPeople
ScalarVariable.description: Number of people living in the building

ScalarVariable.name: building.ALH
ScalarVariable.description: Heated (living) area

ScalarVariable.name: building.cRH
ScalarVariable.description: Clear room hight

ScalarVariable.name: building.flanking
ScalarVariable.description: flanking buildings (0; 1; 2)

ScalarVariable.name: building.outline
ScalarVariable.description: Layout of building; true: long-stretched, false: compact

ScalarVariable.name: building.livingTZoneInit
ScalarVariable.description: Living Area: initial temperature

ScalarVariable.name: building.QHeatNormLivingArea
ScalarVariable.description: Area-specific heating power - modern radiators: 14 - 15 W/m²; space heating: 15 W/m²

ScalarVariable.name: building.n
ScalarVariable.description: Heating system exponent - radiator: 1.3; floor heating: 1 - 1.1

ScalarVariable.name: building.TFlowHeatNorm
ScalarVariable.description: Normal flow temperature - radiator: 55 - 75°C; floor heating: 35 - 45°C

ScalarVariable.name: building.TReturnHeatNorm
ScalarVariable.description: Normal return temperature - radiator: 45 - 65°C; floor heating: 28 - 35°C

ScalarVariable.name: building.TRefHeating
ScalarVariable.description: Reference indoor temperature

ScalarVariable.name: building.qvMaxLivingZone
ScalarVariable.description: Maximumg flow rate in Living Zone

ScalarVariable.name: building.ActivateCooling
ScalarVariable.description: If true, cooling system is activated

ScalarVariable.name: building.TRefCooling
ScalarVariable.description: Reference indoor temperature (has to be higher than the reference heating temperature!)

ScalarVariable.name: building.TFlowCooling
ScalarVariable.description: Supply temperature for cooling

ScalarVariable.name: building.newWindows
ScalarVariable.description: Windows have been replaced after building construction

ScalarVariable.name: building.UseIndividualPresence
ScalarVariable.description: If the presence is used, individual presence data has to be provided, else standart presence is used

ScalarVariable.name: building.PresenceFile
ScalarVariable.description: File with presence timeseries (presence in %; 0% - no one is at home; 100% - everyone is at home)

ScalarVariable.name: building.UseIndividualElecConsumption
ScalarVariable.description: If individual electricity consumption is used, individual consumption data ha to be provided, else standart load profiles are used

ScalarVariable.name: building.ElConsumptionFile
ScalarVariable.description: File with electric consumption time series (consumption in W)

ScalarVariable.name: building.QPerson
ScalarVariable.description: Heat Yield per Person

ScalarVariable.name: building.livingZoneAirLeak
ScalarVariable.description: Air exchange rate caused by leakage in heated zones

ScalarVariable.name: building.VentilationLossesMinimum
ScalarVariable.description: Ventilation losses, when no one is in the building (presence = 0)

ScalarVariable.name: building.VentilationLossesMaximum
ScalarVariable.description: Ventilation losses, when everyone is in the building (presence = 1)

ScalarVariable.name: building.ActivateNightTimeReduction
ScalarVariable.description: If true, night time reduction is activated, else temperature is constant

ScalarVariable.name: building.Tnight
ScalarVariable.description: Temperature at night

ScalarVariable.name: building.NightTimeReductionStart
ScalarVariable.description: Hour, when the temperature can be reduced

ScalarVariable.name: building.NightTimeReductionEnd
ScalarVariable.description: Hour, when the temperature is day temperature again

ScalarVariable.name: building.VariableTemperatureProfile
ScalarVariable.description: If true, presence will be used to define the temperature (if less people are at home, less rooms are heated and the average temperature will decrease)

ScalarVariable.name: building.TMin
ScalarVariable.description: Minimum temperature, when noone is at home (TRefSet = TMin + (TRef - TMin) * Presence(t))

ScalarVariable.name: building.roofInsul
ScalarVariable.description: Thickness of additional insulation of the roof

ScalarVariable.name: building.ceilingInsul
ScalarVariable.description: Thickness of additional insulation of top floor ceiling

ScalarVariable.name: building.wallInsul
ScalarVariable.description: Thickness of additional insulation of the outer walls

ScalarVariable.name: building.floorInsul
ScalarVariable.description: Thickness of additional insulation of walls to cellar or ground

ScalarVariable.name: building.Heating
ScalarVariable.description: Heating mode

ScalarVariable.name: building.Cooling
ScalarVariable.description: Cooling mode

ScalarVariable.name: building.TRefSetHeating
ScalarVariable.description: Reference Temperature for heating (including reduced set temperatures)

ScalarVariable.name: building.QHeat
ScalarVariable.description: Heat Power

ScalarVariable.name: building.QCold
ScalarVariable.description: Cooling Power

ScalarVariable.name: building.Pel
ScalarVariable.description: Common electrical effective power of the zones

ScalarVariable.name: building.EHeat
ScalarVariable.description: Heating energy during simulation time period

ScalarVariable.name: building.Eel
ScalarVariable.description: Electrical energy demand during simulation time period

ScalarVariable.name: building.TZone[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Zone temperature of Cellar, living area and roof

ScalarVariable.name: building.TZone[2]
ScalarVariable.description: Zone temperature of Cellar, living area and roof

ScalarVariable.name: building.TZone[3]
ScalarVariable.description: Zone temperature of Cellar, living area and roof

ScalarVariable.name: building.TZone[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Zone temperature of Cellar, living area and roof

ScalarVariable.name: building.TZone[2]
ScalarVariable.description: Zone temperature of Cellar, living area and roof

ScalarVariable.name: building.TZone[3]
ScalarVariable.description: Zone temperature of Cellar, living area and roof

ScalarVariable.name: building.TZone[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Zone temperature of Cellar, living area and roof

ScalarVariable.name: building.TZone[2]
ScalarVariable.description: Zone temperature of Cellar, living area and roof

ScalarVariable.name: building.TZone[3]
ScalarVariable.description: Zone temperature of Cellar, living area and roof

ScalarVariable.name: building.ECold
ScalarVariable.description: Cooling energy during simulation time period
